title: Great Purge
summary: The Great Purge or the Great Terror (Russian: Большой террор), also known as the Year of '37 (37-ой год, Tridtsat sedmoi god) also known as Yezhovschina ('period of Yezhov'),[6] was Soviet general secretary Joseph Stalin's campaign of political repression in the Soviet Union, and his effort to remove the remaining influence of Leon Trotsky that occurred from 1936 to 1938.[7]
